B

Location - Class in dev.jaakkovirtanen.findandseek.mapobjects
Class defines location of objects on the gameBoard Location is parameter in BoardObject-instances BoardObject-class is abstract class for all objects on the gameBoard Classes that extend BoardObject are: Player, Answer.
Location(int, int) - Constructor for class dev.jaakkovirtanen.findandseek.mapobjects.Location
Constructor with row and column.

Character to concrete move-method.

move(char) - Method in class dev.jaakkovirtanen.findandseek.movealgorithms.MoveDiagonally
 
move(char) - Method in class dev.jaakkovirtanen.findandseek.movealgorithms.MoveNoWay
 
MoveBehaviour - Interface in dev.jaakkovirtanen.findandseek.movealgorithms
Player implements this interface to know how to move Moving behaviour is made by this way to be able to change player's move-logic dynamically during the runtime (for the possible future purposes: example, magic mushroom mix up direction/key) Design principle: "program to an interface, not an implementation".
MoveCardinal - Class in dev.jaakkovirtanen.findandseek.movealgorithms
Behaviour-class let's MapObject (which has a MoveBehaviour) to move cardinally.
MoveCardinal() - Constructor for class dev.jaakkovirtanen.findandseek.movealgorithms.MoveCardinal
 
MoveDiagonally - Class in dev.jaakkovirtanen.findandseek.movealgorithms
Behaviour-class let's MapObject (which has a MoveBehaviour) to move diagonally.
MoveDiagonally() - Constructor for class dev.jaakkovirtanen.findandseek.movealgorithms.MoveDiagonally
 
MoveNoWay - Class in dev.jaakkovirtanen.findandseek.movealgorithms
Behaviour-Class which freezes the BoardObject (which has a MoveBehavior).
MoveNoWay() - Constructor for class dev.jaakkovirtanen.findandseek.movealgorithms.MoveNoWay
